DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy , safety pharmacokinetics ONO-5129 patient type 2 diabetes mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study ONO-5129 Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: 1 . Fasting Blood Glucose 126250mg/dL 2 . HbA1c 6.511 % 1 . Previous treatment antidiabetic agent equal less 23 month prior randomization 2 . History myocardial infarction , coronary artery surgery 3 . Other eligibility criterion specify study protocol
